tool_description: Validates taxpayer identity documents and personal information against government databases and identity verification services.

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format

social_security_number.description: Social security number or national ID

identity_document_type.description: Type of identity document (passport, drivers_license, national_id)

error_messages: Invalid identity document type: Use one of [passport, drivers_license, national_id]
SSN format error: Social security number must be in valid format

Missing required field: All identity fields must be provided
usage: Provide taxpayer's personal information and identity document type. The tool validates against government databases and returns verification status with confidence scores.

verification_details.description: Detailed verification results for each field
